trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies debugging and help information features for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个配置元素，该元素指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务的调试和帮助信息功能。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property to `true` programmatically, you can enable the flow of managed exception information to the client for debugging purposes, as well as the publication of HTML information files for users browsing the service in Web browsers.
trans-unit.target: 如果以编程方式将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> 属性设置为 `true`，则可以将托管异常信息流到客户端以便进行调试，还可以向在 Web 浏览器中浏览该服务的用户发布 HTML 信息文件。

trans-unit.source: Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 向服务返回托管异常信息可能具有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: This is because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为，异常详细信息公开了有关内部客户端实现的信息，这些信息可能被未经授权的服务使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> properties instruct the service to publish HTML help files when the service is viewed using an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 HTML 浏览器查看服务时，<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> 属性指示服务发布 HTML 帮助文件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> properties control the location of the HTML help page that is viewed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 属性控制所查看的 HTML 帮助页的位置。

trans-unit.source: To enable or disable one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement> features using a configuration file, you must:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用配置文件启用或禁用其中一个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement> 功能，必须：

trans-unit.source: Add a `behaviorConfiguration` attribute to the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element for your [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: 添加`behaviorConfiguration`属性设为[<服务>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)元素你[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]服务。

trans-unit.source: (Endpoint behaviors are configured on `<endpoint>` elements; service behaviors on [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) elements.)
trans-unit.target: (在上配置终结点行为`<endpoint>`元素; 上的服务行为[<服务>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)元素。)

trans-unit.source: Add to or create a [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) section and add a [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element to that with the name that matches the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute value from step 1.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到或创建[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)部分，然后添加[<行为>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) ，元素具有与匹配名称`behaviorConfiguration`步骤 1 中属性值。

trans-unit.source: (Endpoint behaviors are configured using an [<endpointBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md) element; service behaviors are configured using a [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) element.
trans-unit.target: (已使用配置终结点行为[ <endpointBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md)元素; 服务行为配置使用[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)元素。

trans-unit.source: Add a [<serviceDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md) element to the [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element from step 2 and enable or disable the various properties appropriate to your scenario.
trans-unit.target: 添加[ <serviceDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicedebug.md)元素[<行为>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)步骤 2 中的元素并启用或禁用各种属性使用适合于你的方案。

trans-unit.source: For a specific example, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 有关具体示例的信息，请参见“示例”部分。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use a configuration file to enable the HTML help page feature and return exception information inside a SOAP fault back to the client for debugging purposes (in addition to enabling metadata support).
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用配置文件来启用 HTML 帮助页功能，并将 SOAP 错误内部的异常信息返回到客户端以便进行调试（另外还启用元数据支持）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this behavior element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此行为元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 行为的类型。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定配置元素的内容复制到此配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string value that specifies the binding to be used when HTTP is utilized to access the service help page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串值，指定利用 HTTP 访问服务帮助页时使用绑定。

trans-unit.source: The binding to be used when HTTP is utilized to access the service help page.
trans-unit.target: 指定利用 HTTP 访问服务帮助页时使用绑定。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the default binding (HttpTransportBindingElement) is used for service help page access as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则在适当的情况下使用默认绑定 (HttpTransportBindingElement) 进行服务帮助页面访问。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that points to an XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指向 XML 节的字符串，该 XML 节定义 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageBinding" /> 中指定的绑定的附加配置信息。

trans-unit.source: An XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 XML 节定义 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageBinding" /> 中指定的绑定的附加配置信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] publishes an HTML help page at the address specified by the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 是否在由 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl" /> 属性指定的地址发布 HTML 帮助页。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if WCF publishes an HTML help page; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WCF 发布 HTML 帮助页，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此属性设置为 `false` 以禁止发布对于 HTML 浏览器可见的 HTML 帮助页。

trans-unit.source: To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> property, you must set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保在由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> 属性控制的位置发布 HTML 帮助页，必须将此属性设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: In addition, one of the following conditions must also be met:
trans-unit.target: 另外，还必须满足以下条件之一：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> property is an absolute address that supports the HTTP protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> 属性是支持 HTTP 协议方案的绝对地址。

trans-unit.source: There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTP protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: 服务有支持 HTTP 协议方案的基址。

trans-unit.source: Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTP protocol scheme is assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.
trans-unit.target: 尽管为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> 属性指定不支持 HTTP 协议方案的绝对地址会引发异常，但不满足前面两个条件的任何其他方案都不会引发异常，也不会发布 HTML 帮助页。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location at which the HTML help file is published.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置发布 HTML 帮助文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute HTTP-based URL of the custom HTML help file the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 HTML 浏览器查看终结点时，用户所见自定义 HTML 帮助文件的基于 HTTP 的相对或绝对 URL。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTP/Get request, for example, from an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性启用自定义 HTML 帮助文件的使用，例如，从 HTML 浏览器通过 HTTP/Get 请求返回的帮助文件。

trans-unit.source: The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows.
trans-unit.target: HTML 帮助文件位置的解析方式如下。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is a relative address, the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTP requests, plus this property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是相对地址，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是支持 HTTP 请求的服务基址加上此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTP requests, the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是绝对地址并支持 HTTP 请求，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTP requests, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是绝对地址但不支持 HTTP 请求，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This property is valid only when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> 属性为 `true` 时，此属性才有效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string value that specifies the binding to be used when HTTPS is utilized to access the service help page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串值，指定利用 HTTPS 访问服务帮助页时使用绑定。

trans-unit.source: The binding to be used when HTTPS is utilized to access the service help page.
trans-unit.target: 指定利用 HTTPS 访问服务帮助页时使用绑定。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the default binding (HttpsTransportBindingElement) is used for service help page access as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，则在适当的情况下使用默认绑定 (HttpsTransportBindingElement) 进行服务帮助页面访问。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that points to an XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指向 XML 节的字符串，该 XML 节定义 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageBinding" /> 中指定的绑定的附加配置信息。

trans-unit.source: An XML section defining additional configuration information for the binding specified in <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 XML 节定义 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageBinding" /> 中指定的绑定的附加配置信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] returns an HTML help file over HTTPS at the address specified by the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否在由 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl" /> 属性控制的地址处通过 HTTPS 返回 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an HTML help file is returned to clients making an HTTPS/GET request, for example, from an HTML browser; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 HTML 帮助文件返回到发出 HTTPS/GET 请求的客户端（例如，从 HTML 浏览器），则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers.
trans-unit.target: 可以将此属性设置为 `false` 以禁止发布对于 HTML 浏览器可见的 HTML 帮助页。

trans-unit.source: To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, you must set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保在由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 属性控制的位置发布 HTML 帮助页，必须将此属性设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: In addition, one of the following conditions must also be met:
trans-unit.target: 另外，还必须满足以下条件之一：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property is an absolute address that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 属性是支持 HTTPS 协议方案的绝对地址。

trans-unit.source: There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: 服务有支持 HTTPS 协议方案的基址。

trans-unit.source: Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTPS protocol scheme is assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.
trans-unit.target: 尽管为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> 属性指定不支持 HTTPS 协议方案的绝对地址会引发异常，但不满足前面两个条件的任何其他方案都不会引发异常，也不会发布 HTML 帮助页。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location at which an HTML help file is published for retrieval using HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置发布 HTML 帮助文件以便使用 HTTPS 进行帮助的位置。

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute HTTPS-based URL of the custom HTML help file the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: 在使用 HTML 浏览器查看终结点时，用户所见自定义 HTML 帮助文件的基于 HTTPS 的相对或绝对 URL。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTPS/Get request, for example, from an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此属性启用自定义 HTML 帮助文件的使用，例如，从 HTML 浏览器通过 HTTPS/Get 请求返回的帮助文件。

trans-unit.source: The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows.
trans-unit.target: HTML 帮助文件位置的解析方式如下。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is a relative address, the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTPS requests, plus this property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是相对地址，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是支持 HTTPS 请求的服务基址加上此属性值的值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTPS requests, the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是绝对地址并支持 HTTPS 请求，则 HTML 帮助文件的位置是此属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTPS requests, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性的值是绝对地址但不支持 HTTPS 请求，则会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: This property is valid only when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 仅当 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> 属性为 `true` 时，此属性才有效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to include managed exception information in the detail of SOAP faults returned to the client for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在返回客户端以供调试的 SOAP 错误详细信息中是否包含托管异常信息。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] returns managed exception information in the SOAP faults for client-side debugging purposes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 在 SOAP 错误中返回托管异常信息以供客户端调试，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property to `true` programmatically, you can enable the flow of managed exception information to the client for debugging purposes, as well as the publication of HTML information files for users browsing the service in Web browsers.
trans-unit.target: 如果以编程方式将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceDebugElement.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> 属性设置为 `true`，则可以将托管异常信息流到客户端以便进行调试，还可以向在 Web 浏览器中浏览该服务的用户发布 HTML 信息文件。

trans-unit.source: Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk.
trans-unit.target: 向服务返回托管异常信息可能具有安全风险。

trans-unit.source: This is because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为，异常详细信息公开了有关内部客户端实现的信息，这些信息可能被未经授权的服务使用。
